dcterms:creator: Siyang Liu

dcterms:description: The ESConv dataset consists of dialogues between help-seekers and supporters, containing rich information such as the situation faced by the help-seeker and annotations of the strategy category used in each response. It includes 1,300 long conversations and a total of 38,350 utterances.
dcterms:title: ESConv dataset

dcterms:creator: Robyn Speer
Joshua Chin
Catherine Havasi
dcterms:description: ConceptNet is a large multilingual knowledge graph that provides general knowledge and relationships between concepts, which can be utilized for enhancing dialogue systems by providing context-related concepts for response generation.
dcterms:title: ConceptNet
